statements: UPDATE backlink_data SET backlink_status = 'active' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE backlink_data SET backlink_type = 'dofollow', backlink_status = 'inactive' WHERE source_domain = 'example.com'
UPDATE backlink_data SET backlink_status='active', backlink_type='dofollow' WHERE id=100;
UPDATE backlink_data SET source_domain='example.com', backlink_type='nofollow', backlink_status='inactive' WHERE id=200;
UPDATE backlinks SET anchor_text = 'New Anchor Text', target_url = 'newtarget.com' WHERE backlink_id = 1;
UPDATE backlink_analysis SET analysis_score = 8.5, analysis_notes = 'Reanalyzed with updated data' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE backlinks SET anchor_text = 'Example Anchor Text', target_url = 'www.example.com', backlink_status = TRUE WHERE backlink_id = 1;
UPDATE backlink_analysis SET analysis_score = 8.5, analysis_notes = 'Good analysis outcome' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE backlinks SET anchor_text = 'Updated Anchor Text' WHERE backlink_id = 'efad6877-9312-4da7-b577-d3662f5c3b07';
UPDATE backlink_history SET http_code = 200, check_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE history_id = '36b05927-6914-489c-974e-418ba1b35fc3';
UPDATE backlinks SET anchor_text = 'New Anchor Text', create_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE backlink_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE linked_pages SET page_title = 'Updated Page Title', last_crawled = '2022-02-15' WHERE page_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Backlinks SET anchor_text = 'Updated anchor text' WHERE backlink_id = 1;
UPDATE ReferringDomains SET domain_rating = 8 WHERE domain_name = 'example.com';
UPDATE Backlinks SET referring_domain = 'example.com' WHERE backlink_id = 1
UPDATE ReferringDomains SET domain_rating = 9, created_at = current_timestamp WHERE domain_id = 3
UPDATE backlinks SET domain_authority = 70 WHERE backlink_id = 1;
UPDATE pages SET title = 'New Title' WHERE page_id = 5;

UPDATE websites SET name = 'Updated Name', domain = 'https://www.updated-domain.com' WHERE website_id = 54321;
